ThingDef.label: “Marauder”RF-01
ThingDef.description: "Marauder" RF-01 is an advanced quadrotor vertical takeoff and landing manned aerocraft. It uses an innovative distributed thrust system to achieve efficient and stable flight performance. Based on the unique structure of the weapon system, it can add and replace most weapons to the aerocraft. Can perform diverse tasks in complex environments. By using its own machine guns and rocket nests to serve special operations, medical rescue, material transportation and other tasks, it provides strong support for modern warfare and emergency rescue.

li.Hover_Icon_Description: Whether to turn on or off the hovering of the aerocraft
li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: Switch between takeoff and landing. “Marauder”RF-01 is a autogyro, which can take off and land vertically at any time. It can only attack in flight. After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.CrossMap_Description: Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel

ThingDef.label: “Patrol”RT-63
ThingDef.description: The "Patrol" RT-63 is a high-performance dual rotor vertical takeoff and landing unmanned aerocraft that adopts an advanced aerodynamic layout, achieving excellent maneuverability and stability. Based on the unique structure of the weapon system, it can be equipped to replace the majority of weapons on the aerocraft. Equipped with multifunctional sensors, it has extensive reconnaissance, surveillance, and target locking capabilities. Suitable for various tasks such as tactical reconnaissance and special operations, it is a capable assistant in modern battlefield and civilian fields.

li.Hover_Icon_Description: Whether to turn on or off the hovering of the aerocraft
li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: Switch between takeoff and landing. “Patrol”RT-63 is a autogyro, which can take off and land vertically at any time. It can only attack in flight. After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

li.FindTarget_Icon_Description: When turned on, the map will retrieve the available targets every 30 seconds. If there are currently no targets to attack, it will automatically fly towards the nearest hostile target for attack

ThingDef.label: “Dedication”RC-X
ThingDef.description: The "Dedication" RC-X is a disposable self-explosive single rotor aerocraft equipped with high-performance propellers that can quickly reach the target area and detonate at critical moments, causing serious damage to enemy facilities and equipment, providing a breakthrough and advantage for the battlefield. Suitable for special operations missions and high-risk environments.

li.Hover_Icon_Description: Whether to turn on or off the hovering of the aerocraft
li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: Switch between takeoff and landing. “Dedication”RC-X is a autogyro, which can take off and land vertically at any time. It can only attack in flight. After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

li.ForceDoExplosion_Description: Self-destruction.After setting the target, fly towards the target location to self destruct, during Self-destruction can be stopped by right-clicking the mouse

li.FindTarget_Icon_Description: When turned on, the map will retrieve the available targets every 30 seconds. If there are currently no targets to attack, it will automatically fly towards the nearest hostile target for attack

ThingDef.label: “Shield”RA-S
ThingDef.description: The "Shield" RA-S is a fully functional auxiliary aerocraft that integrates shield, firefighting, and lighting functions. By providing a protective barrier for personnel and facilities through an efficient energy system, powerful lighting equipment ensures good visibility in harsh environments, and based on the unique construction of the weapon system, it is possible to install and replace the vast majority of weapons on the aerocraft. Suitable for tasks such as battlefield support, fire response, and industrial and mining lighting.

li.Hover_Icon_Description: Whether to turn on or off the hovering of the aerocraft
li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: Switching between takeoff and landing, the “Shield”RA-S can take off and land vertically at any time, and can only attack during flight. After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.
